w :  how did you like your work as a reporter ?
m :  well  it was interesting .  but i had to work long hours .  i was never at home on weekends .

question: what does the man mean ?
choice: he didn ' t like the work so much because it kept him working long hours .
he didn ' t like the work because it wasn ' t interesting .
he liked the work very much .
answer: he didn ' t like the work so much because it kept him working long hours .
